urls.title: Petition: Review the Regulation of Odour Management of Landfill Sites
urls.description: We call for the Government to review how the Environment Agency monitors and manages levels of malodourous gasses. Consideration should be given to compulsory monitoring of emissions of landfill sites and for the EA to be obliged to act with urgency when high levels of odour complaints are received.

tweets.text: So much for today's Riverfly sampling session on the River Red. This is the plight of our #chalkstreams in 2021; another incident chipping away at the river's health. @DevonCC @DanielStanbury @ndevoncouncil Thanks Rebecca. Keeping rivers clear and free of obstacles is the responsibility of the landowner. We get involved if the blockage creates a flood risk. Supermarkets have trolley recovery schemes and will collect if informed.

tweets.text: As climate shocks like ice storms, floods and heatwaves are increasingly felt around the world, the investments people make in companies and products through their pensions could have the biggest environmental impact of any of their personal choices. #RacetoResilience 1/2 https://t.co/ZbquT2tpaO

tweets.text:
Reports show only 1 IN 5 people with #COVID19 symptoms are getting tested 

ALSO more people are neglecting to observe #SelfIsolation when positive or contacts of cases 

Let's lead the way #WestMidlands - and show the country how it's done!

#HandsFaceSpaceFreshAir & #GetTested https://t.co/BvnaeXEgRM

Great team effort by Coventry Park Rangers, Keep Britain Tidy, WatersideCare and Friends of Sowe Valley to create a new wildflower meadow at Cemblet Woods @covparkranger @KeepBritainTidy @stwater @EnvAgencyMids @CRTWestMidlands https://t.co/TUMm73WsUb

This is a disgrace. @sascampaigns were talking sewage, endocrine disruptors and reed beds in THE 90s! THE 90'S!
Get a grip @Ofwat @WaterUK @EnvAgency ! https://t.co/nC8ULSyHQI

I have just seen a photo of a smiling child standing by an airpurifier in her bedroom and I am heartbroken. Babies should smile because life is good, not because they no longer have to breathe filth. #Warzone @ClareDinnisEA @MattHancock @JamesBevanEA @PHE_WestMids

tweets.text: My breathing had improved yesterday by the time we got to Buxton , what does that tell me? I‚Äôd be a hell of a lot safer & healthier if the @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK @MattHancock @PHE_EoEngland @BorisJohnson shut that damn landfill #stopthestink @StinkStopthe https://t.co/QY2lcaqxsH
@Sal_Lydia1 @YorkshireWater @EnvAgency @nedDC Pretty shocking. The worst part about it is that no one acknowledged the problem. No knock on the door to tell either of us it happened. Just went!

@gillian_pepper @SimonBird_ @ChronicleLive We have an officer on site investigating the nature, source and effect on the environment of the substance. However, whilst visually alarming,  we have not seen any impact on wildlife.

urls.title: Bringing back the beaver to North Norfolk
urls.description: After an absence of several hundred years, our project will reintroduce native beavers back to the Glaven River in North Norfolk.
